message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.SE, cs.SI, cs.CY 

This paper focuses on the assessment of the risk of advanced persistent threats (APTs), which is a subfield of computer security (cs.CR). The paper proposes a dynamic model to characterize the time evolution of an organization's state, which involves the use of optimization techniques and heuristic attack strategies, indicating a potential connection to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also discusses the influence of different factors on an organization's risk, which could be related to social implications (cs.SI) and cybersecurity (cs.CY).
